title: People  |  iStartup Lab
meta_description: Helping UW iSchool students develop entrepreneurial skills and launch data-driven social impact startups
main_content: Skip to main content iStartup Lab People Faculty and staff Jeremy Zaretzky Co-Director, iStartup Lab Assistant Teaching Professor, UW Information School Venture Partner, Loyal VC jeremyz@uw.edu iSchool Profile | LinkedIn Mike Teodorescu Co-Director, iStartup Lab Assistant Professor, UW Information School Co-Founder, SurgiBox miketeod@uw.edu iSchool Profile | LinkedIn Advisory board Our advisory board is made up of experienced entrepreneurs, investors, and business leaders, including several iSchool alumni: Abhishek Unnam / AI Manager, SHL Labs Albert Lam / Product Manager, UiPath Amy Hutchins / Director of Product – Mapping and Locations, Procore Technologies Andy Wu / Arjun and Minoo Melwani Family Associate Professor of Business Administration, Harvard Business School Colleen Hilton / Co-founder and CEO, Alli Connect Eric Larsen / Vice Chairperson, Alliance of Angels Jax Morgan / Software Investor, Turn/River Capital Julie Averill / EVP and Chief Information Officer, lululemon Kabir Shahani / Co-Founder and Executive Chair, Avante and Adora Kristie Duffin / CTO, Cascade Asset Management Company Nick Whiting / Technical Co-founder, kumikai Prem Kumar / Co-founder and CEO, Humanly Spencer Christiansen / Head of Operations, Loyal VC Tim Kotin / Director of Data Analytics and GenAI, AmaliTech Services Entrepreneurs-in-residence (EIRs) Our EIRs support our community events and provide mentorship to first-time student founders. EIRs are typically UW students who bring substantial prior experience as entrepreneurs or VC investors. If you’re an iSchool student and would like to schedule a mentoring session with an EIR, please contact us . Autumn 2024 / Winter 2025 EIRs Brian Cao / Founder, Amethyst Luna Chen / Fellow, 8VC Spring 2024 / Summer 2024 EIRs Brian Cao / Founder, Amethyst Jake Harper / Founder, Napkin Winter 2024 EIRs Sierra Lee / Co-founder, DubHacks Next Search University of Washington Be boundless Connect with us: © 2025 University of Washington | Seattle, WA
